outline:
1. great
    1. large (in magnitude and extent)
    2. in number
    3. in intensity
    4. loud (in sound)
    5. older (in age)
    6. in importance
      1. important things
      2. great, distinguished (of men)
      3. God Himself (of God)
    7. great things
    8. haughty things
    9. greatness
kjv_def: [phrase] aloud, elder(-est), [phrase] exceeding(-ly), [phrase] far, (man of) great (man, matter, thing,-er,-ness), high, long, loud, mighty, more, much, noble, proud thing, [idiom] sore, ([idiom]) very.
strongs_def: great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
